reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress comfortable and flattering on curvy bodies, making them feel beautiful.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning Vintage Style â€” Fits Like a Dream
items.body: I purchased the Topdress Womenâ€™s Vintage Polka Audrey 1950s Halter Dress for a baby shower, and I absolutely love it. The retro style is stunning â€” it has that classic, elegant look that really stands out. The material feels nice, the fit was perfect, and it was very comfortable to wear the whole day. I received so many compliments on the color and the vintage silhouette. If you love a timeless, feminine look, this dress is a great choice. Read more
items.author: Anjelica Afrigan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thicker Stiff Material Not Flimsy or Clingy- which I prefer!
items.body: Adorable. Iâ€™m a size 16-18, the 3X fits me perfect. Iâ€™m an apple figure and also busty but. This is slimming in the waist. Iâ€™m going to return this for a different pattern, but the quality is just as I like. It is the thicker Poplin type of material. However, you do need to iron it. I like this material, even though it tends to wrinkle because it doesnâ€™t cling. .. which is my number one requirement. Read more
items.author: KC Shannon

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome dress.
items.body: Cute dress and fits perfectly. Great material and cute pattern. Doesn't stretch out after wearing it for an hour. Great price for this item. I received a lot of compliments on this dress and I'm definitely going to go order more from the same manufacturer Read more
items.author: Irene

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great design and surprisingly well-equipped
items.body: Sooo cute! Not premium material but perfectly serviceable for the price, I just bought another in black. There is a lining and to my surprise, a lot of bust support/slight padding, I didn't need to fool with strapless bras. Wore this for family photos while on vacation. Adjustable back is a huge bonus. No pockets which is a big plus for me re: silhouette (unpopular opinion I know). I was not expecting these cool features at this price point, at all. Read more
items.author: Elizabeth

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love This Dress ðŸ¤Ž
items.body: I never do a review but I am in LOVE! Tried it on because I am wearing this next week to my jobâ€™s Havana Nights themed social. This dress fits perfectly. I ordered an XL but I couldâ€™ve actually gotten a L. Either is fine depending on the look you are going for. I am 186 pounds. I wanted a more tighter fit so I tightened the back and it was PERFECT. I am going to buy more colors. I was skeptical at first and almost ordered a XXL because everyone was saying to order up. Iâ€™m glad I went with my first mind and did the XL because I was able to make it fit how i wanted to thanks to the adjusting straps in the back that brings your waist and bust in! That part is stretchy. The color was everything. The quality of the fabric is amazing. Canâ€™t wait to take pics and come back and upload them!! By the way, I am: 186 pounds, 5â€™2, 38DD, ordered size XL, dress falls a little below my knees (which is great for my jobâ€™s Havana Nights themed work event), could also get away with a L. Read more
items.author: Nique Y

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cutesy! Perfect Tea Party Dress
items.body: This dress was absolutely perfect! I wore it for my Bestie birthday outing. We went to Tea Around Town. And I cannot even count how many compliments I received. This is no exaggeration; everyone loved it. The fit was flattering, the style was elegant, and it paired beautifully with my fascinator and gloves. It gave the perfect touch of retro, classy and chic for the occasion. For reference, I am 5'3" and weigh 154 lbs. I ordered a medium, and it fit just right with a little room to spare. The material has a bit of stretch, which made it very comfortable to wear. If youâ€™re looking for a dress that will turn heads and make you feel fabulous, this is it! JUST BUY IT:) Read more
items.author: Beautiful Browne

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Fabric is scratchy
items.body: They style is spot on to the picture. The fabric is rough and scratchy, also a bit stiff which is nice for the shape of the dress but because it is a bit rough the fabric kept sticking to my tights when I walked and looked bunched up in the front. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Its a nice dress
items.body: Fits good (i got it a 3x but i normal wear a 1x or 2x for comfort) no pockets ðŸ˜ž not very stretchy but have a tie in the back so u can adjust it alittle. ZIPPER ON THE SIDE!!!! very helpful when trying to get it on alone The quality is alright nothing to write home about its comfortable i do think it would last so imma say its good for the money spent (not the material i was expecting but its nice) Read more
items.author: Jess

short_description:
Womens Dress Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Dress Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Black Floral, Red White Plaid, Black/Fuchisa Rose, Pumpkin, 02white Lemon, Black, Black White, Lemon, Orange, Black/Cheery, Porcelain, White Rose, Blush Pink, Lavender. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
